Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
modelisation.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
Item
public class Weapon extends Object implements Item
Represents a weapon or usable item placed inside the backpack. A weapon has a shape, a cost, optional mana consumption and applies effects.
